memberdef.argsstring: (const char *portName, int maxBuffers, size_t maxMemory, int priority, int stackSize)
memberdef.name: ADPICam

briefdescription.para: Constructor.

parameterdescription.para: The name of the asyn port driver to be created.
The maximum number of NDArray buffers that the NDArrayPool for this driver is allowed to allocate. Set this to -1 to allow an unlimited number of buffers.
The maximum amount of memory that the NDArrayPool for this driver is allowed to allocate. Set this to -1 to allow an unlimited amount of memory.
The thread priority for the asyn port driver thread if ASYN_CANBLOCK is set in asynFlags.
The stack size for the asyn port driver thread if ASYN_CANBLOCK is set in asynFlags.

briefdescription.para: Destructor function.

detaileddescription.para: Clear out Picam Library

memberdef.argsstring: (asynUser *pasynUser, char *strings[], int values[], int severities[], size_t nElements, size_t *nIn)
memberdef.name: readEnum

briefdescription.para: Override method from asynPortDriver to populate pull-down lists for camera parameters.

detaileddescription.para: Note that for this to work asynEnumMask must be set when calling ADDriver constructor

briefdescription.para: Handler method for AcquisitionUpdated events.

detaileddescription.para: Grab information about acquired data, as necessary, and send a signal to a thread to grab the data & process into NDArray.

briefdescription.para: Handler method for camera discovery events.

detaileddescription.para: When new cameras become available, or unavailable, move them on and off the lists as appropriate.

briefdescription.para: Handler method called by piParameterRelevanceChanged callback method Sets the relevence of a parameter based on changes in parameters.
Handler method called by piParameterIntegerValueChanged callback method Makes necessary since the parameter has changed.

detaileddescription.para: Primarily will update the Readback value for many parameters.

briefdescription.para: Handler method called by piParameterLargeIntegerValueChanged callback method Makes necessary since the parameter has changed.

detaileddescription.para: Primarily will update the Readback value for many parameters.

briefdescription.para: Handler method called by piParameterFloatingPointValueChanged callback method Makes necessary since the parameter has changed.

detaileddescription.para: Primarily will update the Readback value for many parameters.

briefdescription.para: Handle the case that an ROI value has changed.
Handle case when a PicamPulse value has changed.

detaileddescription.para: Called by piParameterPulseValueChanged.

briefdescription.para: Handle case when a PicamModulations value has changed.

detaileddescription.para: Called by piParameterModulationsValueChanged.

briefdescription.para: Print the Rois constraint information.
Handler class for recieving new images.

detaileddescription.para: This runs in a thread separate from the picam driver thread to avoid collisions. Acquisition in the picam thread will signal this thread as soon as possible when new images are seen.

briefdescription.para: Overload method for asynPortDriver's report method.
Override asynPortDriver's writeInt32 method.
Overload asynPortDriver's writeFloat64 to handle driver specific parameters.
Read String information for fields with Enumeration type and no constraint type.
Callback method for acquisition Upadated event.

detaileddescription.para: This will call piHandleAcquisitionUpdated ASAP.

briefdescription.para: Local Method used to add a Demo camera to the list of available cameras.

detaileddescription.para: This method is called by wrapper method PICamAddDemoCamera which can be called from the iocsh.

briefdescription.para: Callback method for camera discovery.

detaileddescription.para: This method calls the piHandleCameraDiscovery method of the camera instance.

briefdescription.para: Callback to Handle when a FloatingPoint value changes.

detaileddescription.para: Hand off to method piHandleParameterFloatingPointValue of the stored class instance

briefdescription.para: Callback method to handle when an Integer Value Changes.

detaileddescription.para: Hand off to the method piHandleParameterIntergerValueChanged of the stored class instance.

briefdescription.para: Callback to Handle when a LargeInteger value changes.

detaileddescription.para: Hand of to the method piHandleParameterLargeIntergerValueChanged of the stored class instance.

briefdescription.para: Callback to Handle when a PicamModulations value changes.

detaileddescription.para: Hand off to the method picamHandleModulationValueChanged of the stored class instance.

briefdescription.para: Callback to Handle when a PicamPulse value changes.

detaileddescription.para: Calls method piHandleParameterPulseValueChanged of the stored class instance.

briefdescription.para: Callback event to catch when a parameter's relevance has changed.

detaileddescription.para: Calls method piHandleParameterRelevanceChanged of stored class instance.

briefdescription.para: Callback to Handle when a Roi value changes.

detaileddescription.para: Calls method piHandleParameterRoisValueChanged of the stored class instance.

briefdescription.para: Initialize Picam property initialization.
Internal method called when the Acquire button is pressed.
Internal method called when stop acquire is pressed.
Set all PICAM parameter exists parameters to false.
Set all PICAM parameter relevance parameters to false.

briefdescription.para: Given a PICAM library Parameter, return the associated areaDetector Driver Parameter.
Provide a translation between parameters for this camera (& those inherited by ADDriver as necessary) and Picam's parameters.
Register callbacks for constraint changes.
Register to watch to changes in parameter relevance.
Register to watch for changes in a parameter's value.
Set the value stored in a parameter existance PV.
Set the value stored in a parameter relevance PV.
Change the parameter values based on those stored in the camera as the selected detector changes.

briefdescription.para: Set values for the ROI parameters.

detaileddescription.para: PICAM holds these parameters in a single object instead of as separate parameters.

briefdescription.para: Set the selected camera based on user input.
set the selected unavailable camera (to show camera info) based on user input
Unregister constraint change callbacks for the currently selected detector.
Unregister Parameter Relevance callback for parameters in the currently selected camera.
Unregister Parameter Value Change callbacks for the currently selected camera.
Reread the list of available detectors to make the list available to the user as detectors come online/go offline.
Update PICAM parameter existance for the current detector.
Update PICAM parameter relevance for the current detector.
Update the list of unavailable Camera list.

detaileddescription.para: This is called as detectors go online/offline

memberdef.name: piWriteInt32CollectionType

briefdescription.para: Write an int 32 value when the constraint type is a collection.

detaileddescription.para: In this case the output will be a string associated with the collection enum value.

memberdef.argsstring: (asynUser *pasynUser, epicsInt32 value, int driverParameter, PicamParameter picamParameter)
memberdef.name: piWriteInt32RangeType

briefdescription.para: Write int 32 values when a parameters constraint type is range.

detaileddescription.para: This will do some bounds checking according to the range and will not allow setting a value outside of that range.
